title: Hard Problem
text:
[This space is intentionally left blank.]InputMultiple test cases. Each contains a single integer N (1 ≤ N ≤ 50). Input terminates by EOF.OutputFor each test case, output one line contains the answer. See the example.ExampleInput:
8
9
10

Output:
8=90*(0+0+0+0+45-3+20-42+60+10)
9=20*(0-3+10-14+15+2+0+0+0+0+10)
10=66*(0+0+0+0+0+33+5-33+66-66+55+6)
